直接搞個host!
電郵地址: [url]info@ddos-guard.net[/url]
主題: Serious term violation by a site hosted on ddos-guard.net
內容: （記住改署名！）
Dear sir/madam:

It has come to my attention that https://hkleaks.cc/ , hosted by ddos-guard.net as per the whois protocol, is leaking personal data of a lot of Hong Kong citizens. Most of them are journalists. This malicious exposure is seriously hurting their privacy and in some cases, personal safety.

According to the published terms on and condition, https://ddos-guard.net/file/sladdg_en.pdf , article 6.5.2, on page 8, "violation of the confidentiality of personal information" is clearly violated.

Moreover, there were already incidents where civilians in Hong kong were physically attacked by thugs, utilizing information provided by the site. This is a clear violation of "use of tools for thepurpose of slander, use of content known to contain viruses or content which constitutes acriminal attack or gives rise to any crimes or civil riots" of the same article 6.5.2

Please remove this site ASAP and we thank you for your good conscience.

Wish you a blessed day,

Yours sincerely
